test-case.name: system-property-001
test-case.description: Test that xsl:version is a valid system-property and the returned result is an xs:string with numeric value between 1.0 and 2.0.

test-case.name: system-property-002
test-case.description: Test that xsl:vendor is a valid system-property and the returned result is an xs:string.

test-case.name: system-property-003
test-case.description: Test that xsl:vendor-url is a valid system-property and the returned result is an xs:string.

test-case.name: system-property-004
test-case.description: Test that xsl:product-name is a valid system-property and the returned result is an xs:string.

test-case.name: system-property-005
test-case.description: Test that xsl:product-version is a valid system-property and the returned result is an xs:string.

test-case.name: system-property-006
test-case.description: Test that xsl:is-schema-aware is a valid system-property and the returned result is an xs:string - one of 'yes' or 'no'.

test-case.name: system-property-007
test-case.description: Test that xsl:supports-serialization is a valid system-property and the returned result is an xs:string. Conditional xsl:if used to verify result value is 'yes' or 'no'

test-case.name: system-property-008
test-case.description: Test that xsl:supports-backwards-compatibility is a valid system-property and the returned result is an xs:string - one of 'yes' or 'no'.

test-case.name: system-property-009
test-case.description: Test to verify that all specification defined arguments of system-property must be lower case or they will not be recognized.

test-case.name: system-property-010
test-case.description: Test to show that empty string is returned if the argument in system-property() does not have a prefix, (even if the default namespace is set to the 'xsl' namespace and the keyword is correct).

test-case.name: system-property-011
test-case.description: Test to verify that system-property($property) accepts an argument that comes from a node, variable and subsequence and the result returned is an xs:string.
